section.para: The ngx_http_random_index_module module processes requests ending with the slash character (‘/’) and picks a random file in a directory as an index file. It works before the ngx_http_index_module module.
This module is not built by default, it should be enabled with the --with-http_random_index_module configuration parameter.

directive.name: random_index
directive.para: Enables or disables module processing in a surrounding location.
